results.title: Multimodal Blockade of the Renin-Angiotensin System Is Safe and Is a Potential Cancer Treatment for Cats
results.text_hl: In the present study, the safety of multimodal RAS inhibition using @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_benazepril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C044946 @@@benazepril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Meloxicam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077239 @@@meloxicam@@@ was assessed in six @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Squamous_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002294 @@@squamous cell carcinomas@@@.
